name: ice break (itch)
description:
A little game for the Winter Wizard Jam 2015. Sail around procedurally generated icebergs and chill out.

I recommend that you immediately mute my bullshit song and instead listen to this 10 hour version of the Mario 64 Dire Dire Docks/Jolly Roger Bay song.

PC Controls:

Mouse look + WASD (PC)

M - Mute music

R - Reload. Sometimes you'll spawn inside an iceberg or whatever, in which case do this.

Mouse 1 - Change camera

Mouse 2 - Horn

Mouse 3 - Bell

Space - Crane

360 pad controls:

Left stick - Steer

Right stick - Look

Triggers - Forward/Back

A - Change camera

B - Horn

X - Bell

Y - Crane
